name: European Cosmetics Responsible Person Association
goal:
ERPA is the European cosmetic Responsible Person Association gathering European Professional Responsible Persons, Safety Assessors and Cosmetic testing Laboratories, and other compliance operators in field of Cosmetics.

ERPA aims to support the efforts in protecting the safety of the cosmetic products users in Europe by promoting high standards of services and professional conduct among the European Responsible Persons.

ERPA seeks to generate awareness of the European Responsible Person roles and obligations.

ERPA seeks to encourage high standard of professional conduct and competence among the European Responsible Persons.

ERPA seeks to create guidelines of cooperation among the compliance operators involved in the regulatory affairs of cosmetic products.
interests: Business and Industry, Education and training, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: ERPA is following the implementation and amendments of the cosmetics regulation 1223/2009, including guidance and other technical ocuments
